decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Marath, Will of the Wild's ability to create +1/+1 counters to build a board presence and overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures. The deck includes a variety of mana ramp creatures like Arbor Elf, Birds of Paradise, and Bloom Tender to quickly accelerate the mana needed to cast Marath and other impactful creatures. Cards like Birthing Pod, Eladamri's Call, and Green Sun's Zenith help tutor for specific creatures that synergize well with the aggressive game plan. Additionally, removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt provide answers to threats while cards like Skullclamp offer card draw to keep the pressure on opponents. The deck aims to win through combat damage by efficiently deploying threats and outvaluing opponents.

This deck focuses on utilizing the partners Sam, Loyal Attendant and Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy in a Duel Commander format. The deck includes a mix of powerful creatures, removal spells, and versatile support cards to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. By combining efficient mana ramp with disruptive creatures like Drannith Magistrate and Dauthi Voidwalker, as well as powerful finishers like Emrakul, the Promised End and Tarmogoyf, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly while using the commanders' abilities to generate additional value. With a selection of versatile spells like Swords to Plowshares and Abrupt Decay, this deck is designed to adapt to different matchups and maintain a potent offense.
